choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
explain use of Large Language Models (LLM) in AI research

### Response:


Large Language Models, or LLMs for short, are a crucial part of advancing Artificial Intelligence technology. These models serve as the foundation upon which other AI systems can be built. They provide state-of-the-art natural language processing abilities and learn from user interactions. Researchers in this field use these advanced models to develop smarter computer assisted instruction (CAI) systems, creating a more human-like conversational agent. These LLMs help improve the understanding between man and machine, leading eventually to stronger AI with human-like qualities.

In conclusion:
Large Language Models play an essential role in advancing Artificial Intelligence technology by providing state-of-the-art natural language processing abilities and learning from user interactions. They form the foundation upon which other AI systems can be built, ultimately leading to stronger AI with more human-like qualities. Researchers working on these advanced models contribute significantly to the development of smarter CAI systems.
